body: I recently heard that it is not allowed to kill players behind the walls before the game starts, this is unfair because I have a clear shot at my enemy so why not kill him, and the target of the game is to kill other players, so if you want to stop people from doing it make a code or something to stop arrows from reaching the other place or make the walls higher or something but dont ban people for it
